meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of catechesis.
meanings.sent1: The catechistic lesson was easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The catechistic teachings helped the students learn about their faith.
meanings.sent3: The catechistic approach made learning about religion fun and engaging.
meanings.sent4: Her catechistic explanation was like a guiding light in the darkness of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The catechistic nature of the class made it memorable and impactful.

meanings.definition: In the form of questions and answers used in teaching religion.
meanings.sent1: The catechistic method of teaching made it interactive for the students.
meanings.sent2: The catechistic format of the lesson encouraged participation from the class.
meanings.sent3: The catechistic style of teaching turned the classroom into a lively quiz show.
meanings.sent4: Her catechistic approach to teaching religion was like a game of mental gymnastics.
meanings.sent5: The catechistic structure of the lesson made it engaging and informative.
